data.title: 键入缺少的字母，完成下面的文字
data.blankContent: In the seventh and final book, of course, Harry does not attend school, and so the transition from Muggle to Wizarding worlds does not occur. However, in ____ opening ____ of ____ book, Harry ____ his ____ birthday ____ comes ____ age. At ____ point, he ____ allowed ____ do ____ on ____ own, and ____ the ____ from ____ to ____ of ____ does ____ require ____ the ____ Express. As he has also left the Dursley house for the last time, there have already been fairly major transitions, so adding another one would be superfluous.
data.partBlankContent: In the seventh and final book, of course, Harry does not attend school, and so the transition from Muggle to Wizarding worlds does not occur. However, in t__ opening chap____ of th__ book, Harry rea____ his seven______ birthday a__ comes o_ age. At th__ point, he i_ allowed t_ do ma___ on h__ own, and s_ the trans_____ from repre_____ to encour_______ of ma___ does n__ require boar____ the Hogw____ Express. As he has also left the Dursley house for the last time, there have already been fairly major transitions, so adding another one would be superfluous.
data.answer: 当然，在第七部，也是最后一本书中，哈利没有上学，所以没有发生从麻瓜世界到巫师世界的转变。然而，在这本书的第一章中，哈利过了十七岁生日，成年了。此时，他可以自己施魔法，所以从抑制到鼓励魔法的转变不需要登上霍格沃茨特快列车。由于他也是最后一次离开德思礼家，已经发生了相当大的过渡，所以再添一个就多余了。
